name: Purrpatrator
description:
Purrpatrator is a  2 player multiplayer game about a young child and a cat, and the chaos they cause within a household. You can play as either the human or the cat, and must compete in real-time with an opponent playing the opposite role. 

Players must try to outscore their opponents by performing unique actions that grant themselves points but contradict the goal of their opponent. The cat’s goal is to steal food around and cause as much damage as it can to the furniture in the house, while the human’s goal is to complete chores and keep the house nice and tidy.

In this cycle of kid vs kitty, only one player can come out on top. Will it be the child, fulfilling their responsibilities and satisfying their parents, or will the cat’s destructive tendencies be their downfall?

Purrpatrator was developed by Dapnye, a team of passionate student developers from UOW KDU with a love of Malaysian culture and queerness. The team consists of:

  • Valis Teoh
    Lead Artist, Designer
  • Euan Ooi Zhanyuan
    Lead Programmer
  • Johann Tan
    Lead Designer
  • Hew Wan Juin
    3D Environmental Artist
  •  Chan Soon Yee, Zovy 
    Character Modeller and Animator
  • Ainun Nawwarah
    Game Mechanics Programmer 
  • Yeong Chu Yao
    Multiplayer and Game Mechanics Programmer
  • Ng Wei Yuen
    Multiplayer and Game Mechanics Programmer
  • Noor Adriana Putri Binti Noor Zainy
    Technical Artist and Programmer
  •  Chan Kwok Chun
    Audio Programmer

With Special Thanks and Guest Starring : 

  • Ainun's own little kitty out of 35, Jacques!


Install Instructions: 
1. Download the APK.
2. Install the APK onto your phone.
3. Play and Enjoy!
